data.text: Mina ɠaazuɠula faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nuiti ba,
Mazɔlɔɔ ta-ɠisiɛi ɠa nɔ ga ti suɠoloɠolo,
Pɛlɛi ɠa ɗa lo ga ɠimalai,
Faaɠwɛgi ɠa a ɗa buuʋɛti daave ga
Zunui ɠigi ma, toɠa ga zunui suzeeliai,
Mazɔlɔɔ faazeikpasu ʋagɔi ɠa ɗa zoo è kɔɔi ɠɔ la,
Ɠimalala nui la zooga é ʋa ɠima vaiti gaaɠa.
Zɔi ná-kisiɛi ga é faa ɲɔi ɠɛ,
Ɠimalala nui ná-kidafaawui ɠa ga kotoi,
Ɗa iɲɔteʋena kpɔlɔi ma ziɛgi zu,
Naati unmɔɔ, niiti ti liizu ga tiye ga ti ti lɔ saai zu,
Mina ɠɛ ma: «Ee, gè la ɠɛa suɠwɛɛ!»
Dòun zunu, kɔin gulɔi ɠɔmɔ, mazɔlɔɔ kɔin gulɔi ʋagɛ,
Ɠitoo su, ga ɠimalai ʋagɛ ɗa-eteai ma vaa ma.
Mina woya lɔ telebo nui ná-pɛlɛi ma, ga faa ɲɔu,
Mazɔlɔɔ anɛɛ ni telebo nui loo la ɠa ɠɛɛzu lɔfela, toɠa wuzeɠe,
Mina ɠoozunɛ ni è zili nui a loona,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa naa ɠa ga wanama vaa,
Mina yiiɠaawana naati ta-vaa zu, niiti ti faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛzu,
Mazɔlɔɔ kulanuma la naati tuɠɔ, niiti ti faa ɲɔi ɠɛɛzu,
Dòun zunu, unfe Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ma ta masagi.
Mazɔlɔɔ ti ɠoloɠolo fai ɠa ɠula ti viliba,
Wɛlɛ nii ɠa ɠima nuiti ti boga mɔnɔ.
Ni tukpɔɠaaleʋe nui a ɠɛna faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ma:
Kɛlɛ tama zɔiti ti faa ɲɔu ɠɛ nui ʋeelalazu,
Gooɠaaʋotegi é veezu ga gaamai,
Aisa è ʋa ɗa-ʋɛlɛi lo,
Mina zeele woo wo fuun è-zeiɲɔɠɔi laalɔɠɔma,
Mina ɠɛ ma: «Nà sosu, eɠɛʋelei é sòni da,
Gè leʋeni ɲaka nui ta ná-kpala kpelamaʋɛ,
Wɛlɛ, kpolo ɠaingiti ta gui ɲɔiti ti ɠɛni ʋɔnɔsu ná pɛ,
Gè naa ɠaai ma, gè tɔɔzeini ga ɠigaiziɛ,
È lago ɲi nɔ, è lago ɠaazuʋɛɛ ma fɔin nɔ,
naama ziɛgi zu, baladai ɠa na ʋa è ʋɔ, eɠɛ nui é ɠulazu è viliba,
